Notepad++ - Smart Notes, Secure Data & PDF Manager Notepad++ helps you save, organize, and protect your important notes, memos, and favorite data in one powerful app. Create notes with different colors, images, font styles, and font sizes to match your needs and stay organized effortlessly. This app plus your ears equals complete freedom in writing music! A comprehensive set of tools for any musician: * Chord Progression: Create beautiful chord progressions with full flexibility - use inversions, sus2, sus4, 7th, 9th, and more. Enjoy live playback as piano or synth, or send MIDI directly to your macOS computer! * MIDI Keyboard: Transform your phone into a MIDI keyboard for your macOS computer (compatible with macOS Catalina and newer). * Notation Practice: Practice reading notes in both treble and bass clefs. * Chord Calculation: Help you learn how to calculate chords and progressions. * Interval Practice: Practice recognizing and comparing musical intervals by ear. * Voice & Ear Training: Simple, effective tools for voice practice and ear training. Plus, enjoy the macOS version included with your purchase!

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Onyx is a revolutionary new utility that allows you to modify a captured image in real-time using variable input data. Using cutting edge AI processing, Onyx lets you remotely create seamless alterations to photos moments after they've been taken - all with your spectator's camera. For example: â€” Make a playing card appear in your spectator's wallet. â€” Morph your spectator's shadow to look like their thought of animal. â€” Take a photo of your spectator holding a signed card. They name *any* other card. The signed card in the photo transforms to match their thought. â€” Supplement your Gypsy Queen routine with Onyx, allowing you to zoom in on a photo of your spectator holding the Queen of Hearts for the reveal. â€” Reveal a thought-of word, name, or initials hidden naturally in the light reflections of a spectator's eye. â€” Change the time on a photo of a clock. â€” Remove your spectator's wristwatch in a photo, making it seem that it was removed earlier. ...and more! If you can describe it, Onyx can likely create it. Onyx is particularly great for a reveal within something ephemeral. Take a photo of someone's shadow, a landscape shot of the clouds, a flicker on a TV screen or more, and Onyx will realistically insert their free choice. * Variable Delayed Input Inspired by the popular variable trigger system featured in DFB X, Onyx pauses and automatically waits for input, letting you remotely modify a photo *after* it's been taken. * Cutting Edge Technology Take a photo, then have your spectator make a free choice. Onyx's advanced technology seamlessly transforms the photo remotely. * Create Unlimited Effects Change signed playing cards, reveal initials and names, or modify writing. Reveal *anything you can imagine* within a genuine photo you just took. * Your Integrations. Their Camera The effect happens entirely with the spectator's camera. With Onyx's powerful integrations, your phone never needs to leave your pocket. * Invisible, Advanced Technology As only the spectator's device is in play, Onyx's advanced technology remains hidden and inconspicuous. * Third Party Integrations Use your favourite magic apps' input methods, including: â€” Earworm's covert typing Web Search & Notes input â€” Native voice input â€” WebFX's Wrist Gestures â€” WikiTest â€” PeekSmith â€” Bridge ...and any compatible third-party app. Onyx is a tool specifically designed for entertainment purposes. It uses purchaseable in-app credits or a funded OpenRouter account for best-in-class automatic edits. Onyx supports: Arabic, Bengali, Bulgarian, Chinese simplified and traditional, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Estonian, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Latvian, Lithuanian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Death is not the end. Play as a failed alchemic experiment and explore the sprawling, ever-changing castle to find out what happened on this gloomy islandâ€¦! That is, assuming youâ€™re able to fight your way past its keepers. Dead Cells is a roguevania action platformer that will require you to master frantic 2D combat with a wide variety of weapons and skills against merciless minions and boss. Kill. Die. Learn. Repeat. First available on PC and consoles, the indie hit Dead Cells is now slaying foes on mobile! Main Features â€¢ Roguevania: The progressive exploration of an interconnected world, with the replayability of a rogue-lite and the adrenaline-pumping threat of permadeath â€¢ Frantic and Dynamic 2D Action: Learn your enemiesâ€™ patterns to stay alive, or prepare to be sent back to your cell before you can say â€œbaguetteâ€ â€¢ Nonlinear Progression: Unlock new levels with every death, opt for the path that suits your current build, your playstyle or just your mood. Surely, the ramparts canâ€™t be as bad as the sewers, right? â€¢ Play at your own pace: Will you explore every nook and cranny of the castle, or rush to the end? *Latest updates are available: Clean Cut & The End is Near* RETURN TO CASTLEVANIA DLC Time for some vampire slaying â€¢ New storyline - overcome the Ruler of Darkness alongside Alucard and Richter Belmont, â€¢ 2 new biomes - Explore Dracula's Castle and its outskirts â€¢ 9 new monsters - Werewolves, haunted armors, and medusas are waiting for you â€¢ 14 new weapons - wield the Vampire Killer or the Holy Water to defeat creatures of the night, â€¢ 3 new bosses - go fangs to fangs against Death and Dracula himself â€¢ 20 new outfits - dress as your favorite Castlevania characters such as Simon and Richter Belmont or Alucard â€¢ Alternative soundtracks - play along 51 Castlevania original tracks and 12 tunes reimagined in the style of Dead Cells THE BAD SEED DLC You reap what you sow â€¢ New levels to lose your head in the not-so-peaceful Dilapidated Arboretum and the noxious Morass of the Banished â€¢ New monsters to rip to pieces: get to know the locals, such as the Jerkshroom and the Yeeter â€¢ New weapons to play with: trim sticking-out heads with the Scythe Claw, or make them dance to the sound of the Rhythm n' Bouzouki â€¢ New boss to fight against: Mama Tick is dying to meet you FATAL FALLS DLC Ready for a leap of faith? â€¢ 3 new biomes - Get some fresh air at the Fractured Shrines, splash around at the Undying Shores and take a picture at the Mausoleum â€¢ 8 new monsters - The Cold Blooded Guardians and their friends would love to teach you about their culture. ... Wait, aren't those relatives of yours in the Undying Shores...? â€¢ 7 new weapons - Lil' Serenade is perfect for breaking the ice with the locals, although the Snake Fangs would make for a perfect souvenir... â€¢ 1 new boss - The Scarecrow is very proud of his gardening skills and won't hesitate to show off QUEEN AND THE SEA DLC Take it to the sea! â€¢ 2 new biomes - Battle your way through a rotten shipwreck, or scale a burning lighthouse and confront your deadliest foe yet. â€¢ 9 new weapons, including a throwable shark, a trident and a pirate hook hand (eyepatch not included). â€¢ 2 new bosses - Don't lose your head before you meet the Queen! This DLC also gives you the usual extras: - A not-so-cute pet. - Loads of new outfits. - New enemies to bash. WARNING: Devices with less than 2 Gb of RAM may not be able to run this content correctly. We recommend not to take this DLC if your device is under 2gb of RAM. Carefully redesigned for mobile with a revamped interface â€¢ Two game modes available: Original & Auto-Hit â€¢ Custom controls & More touch controls options available: Change the buttonsâ€™ position and size to your liking, swipe to dodgeâ€¦ â€¢ MFi external controller support â€¢ No ads, no F2P mechanics! If you run into a problem, please contact us at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com with as much information as possible on the issue.
